name: Dough Deep
description:
What came first: the vanilla or the egg? Find your own answer before the Oven’s Timer fully counts down and you meet your Baker. In this 3D adventure platformer, utilize your dough-slinging abilities to pass environmental obstacles, meet new friends, and overcome lapses of existential dread. Serving existentialism with a pinch of nicecore, Dough Deep has an atmosphere that will surely butter the audience up for casual, introspective, and platforming-fans alike.

PLATFORM: Through bits of yourself onto any solid surface to create a bounce pad to get onto taller buildings. These bits of dough harden to create platforms later. But watch out! Those platforms don't stay for long!

EXPLORE: Wander around the oven, go wherever your dough can take you, and meet new friends along the way. Life is short, and the residents of the oven have many different ideas about what happens when we die. Maybe you can help some of them accomplish their goals!

SOLVE MYSTERIES: What are all the Cannoli Agents looking for? And why won't they allow you to the upper level of the oven? Talk to the locals, see what's going on, and maybe they'll let you up...

Credits:

Dylan Valev: Programming, Design, Writing

McKenna Gameros: Writing, Music

Tariq Rakha: 3D Models

Assets used:

Baked Goods 2D UI Assets: Paloma González-Gálvez

Road Signs: Mantifang

Kitchen Models: Too Many Items: Kitchen Props 

Sounds: freesound.org
